goals__remit: We are a small organisation offering full-spectrum business and technical support for Research & Innovation. We are able to provide a professional yet affordable personal service to our clients and respond rapidly and effectively to requests for assistance. We have a wide range of contacts in business and academia and hands on experience in planning and managing complex research and innovation projects.
